pwyf.error.not_open:
Something bad happened and your tunnel did not open. Please check the logs or contacts devs :/
%s
pwyf.ready: Your tunnel is ready! Share the following IP with your friends: [%s]
pwyf.success.message: Your token is valid! Enjoy your tunnel (lol)
pwyf.failed.message: Your token is invalid or something went wrong. Check the logs.
pwyf.token_length: Ngrok token should exactly be 49 characters long (yours: %s)
pwyf.token_hint.1: Please sign up at ngrok.com and enter your auth token below
pwyf.token_hint.2: After you sign up, click 'Add Tunnel Authtoken', then 'Save' and 'Copy & Close'
pwyf.token_hint.3: Then paste the thing you just copied into the box below and click 'Done'
